item.description:
Cost: Members: $20 in advance with $5 back at check-in. Non-members: $20

Will 2013 be your breakout year? You work hard to build your business. You’re itching to make a good living doing what you love. At WBOA, we’re deeply committed to connecting you to resources to help you grow your business and make more money, faster. That’s why we've invited serial entrepreneur Linda Tomb to speak this month, to provide you with a unique training to jump start your income now:

Savvy Money Making Secrets to Create a Wealthy Spirit and a Fat Wallet!

In this talk, you’ll learn:

  • The secret sauce missing from your business that can turbo charge your income
  • How to stop those time and energy thieves once and for all
  • A proven system to even out the cash-flow roller coaster

It's time to stop struggling and make good money doing what you love, because the world desperately needs what you have to offer.

Linda Tomb (pronounced “Tom”)A serial entrepreneur who spent the past 20 years in California before returning to her native Connecticut, Linda helped grow successful businesses in several different markets, including enterprise software, professional services (a chimney sweep company with operations in three states), and a venture capital-backed dot-com enterprise. Now raising a growing family, her passion for "starting things" has become a passion to help others start things. She now works with women entrepreneurs in companies of all sizes, helping them to define and then achieve "success," in all of its myriad forms. Drawing frequently on both Eastern and Western religious traditions, Linda helps her clients connect to their sense of purpose in the world as they navigate the never ending needs of work, family, friends, and extracurriculars. Linda is also a licensed spiritual counselor, the founder of the Connecticut chapter of the Dartmouth Entrepreneurial Network, and a member of the Advisory Board of Over40Females.
item.name: April Breakfast Meeting: Savvy Money Making Secrets
